name: DailyLewis
0:
”Alexa open daily lewis”
”Alexa ask daily lewis for a quote”
”Alexa give a quote from daily lewis”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily lewis
des:
Simply say, "Alexa, launch Daily Lewis."

Daily Lewis is a collection of quotes from a broad range of the works of CS Lewis.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
